titleStmt.title: Master Hollis his speech in Parliament the 21, of March 1642 wherein is contained his declaration concerning the Kings Atturney Generall for his abuse given to the House of Commons in the accusation of high treason against the sixe members of the House : as also his advice concerning the last commands issued from the said House.
Speech in Parliament the 21 of March, 1642, wherein is contained his declaration concerning the Kings Atturney Generall
titleStmt.author: Holles, Denzil Holles, Baron, 1599-1680.
